text: Uzma is a female name used in mostly Pakistan, India, and Iran. Those with the name include: *Uzma Aslam Khan, a Pakistani writer *Uzma Alkarim, a famous senior respected anchor in Pakistan *Uzma Gillani, a Pakistani actress and advertiser *Uzma Gondal, a Pakistani cricketer *Uzma Khan, a Pakistani actress and model *Uzma Khan (politician), a Pakistani politician *Uzma Qadri, a Pakistani politician ==See also== * * Category:Pakistani feminine given names Category:Indian feminine given names Category:Iranian feminine given names
title: Uzma
